about_the_game:
TOTAL! ESPORTS! ACTION!

YOU are the manager of a rookie Esports team! Only you can lead them fame and glory! Recruit star players, balance your budget, train the team to be the best they can be, and become Esports League Champions! Work as a T.E.A.M.!

content_descriptors.notes: This is a simulation game in which players assume the role of an Esports team manager. In addition to managing team members' skill and teamplay, the manager must also balance their wellbeing to ensure that team members perform well. There are also various scenarios which appear during training sessions, both positive and negative. Topics range from bullying, homophobia, sexism and racism.

detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Manage a team of professional gamers to become Esports Champions!
  • Recruit and fire athletes to create your perfect team
  • Make decisions based on coach reports to keep your house happy
  • Balance your budget for big profits!
